description: Eohippus Lake is actually in British Columbia, but the normal access is from the Alberta side.Flowers are amazing in July, but we have travelled there in every season including winter which is also magnificent.Several lakes in the vicinity to enjoy, or extend the hike along Monarch Ramparts to Healy Pass.
directions: Sunshine Village Ski Resort. We started at the Village and ended at the Base Parking Lot.
title: Eohippus Lake
